medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was in his usual state of health until last night around 9pm when he experienced acute onset of abdominal pain in bilateral lower quadrants. The pain became diffuse over the next few hours and the patient presented to the emergency department overnight. In the ED, he received IV morphine resulting in complete resolution of the abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of latent TB s/p treatment; no past surgical history and no medications reported.
medical_history.family_history: Mother (deceased) due to accident; father (deceased) due to CVA; siblings and daughter in good health.
medical_history.social_history: History of tobacco abuse; no recent travel, sick contacts, or new food.
